name: TERNIONS
description:
Speed: reach a highscore of 10000 to get this Skill . this skill will increase your speed which will help you dodge the enemies as well as getting points faster.

Strength: this skill will increase your attack against polygon blocks . you will be able to break polygon blocks faster .

Defence: Reach the score of 100,000 to unlock this skill . this skill is the best skill of the game . enemies will not be able to hurt you and you can move freely around the map . you can bounce off the enemies with this skill.
